name: SnowReportforMammothMountain
0:
”Alexa, ask Mammoth Mountain for the snow report”
”Alexa, open Mammoth Mountain”
”Alexa, ask Mammoth Mountain for latest conditions”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mammoth mountain snow report
des: The Mammoth Mountain Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry brings you the latest snow fall, snow surface conditions, base depth, trail, and lift operations information.
